specials.title: Bruschetta
specials.description: Savor the taste of Italy with our delightful bruschetta. Toasted bread topped with ripe tomatoes, fragrant basil, and a drizzle of olive oil. Experience the essence of Italian cuisine in every bite.

specials.title: Greek Salad
specials.description: Experience the freshness of the Mediterranean with our Greek Salad. Crisp lettuce, juicy tomatoes, cucumber, tangy feta cheese, and briny Kalamata olives come together in a harmonious blend. Tossed with a zesty dressing, this salad is a refreshing delight that captures the vibrant flavors of Greece.

specials.title: Lemon cake
specials.description: Indulge in the tantalizing sweetness of our Lemon Cake. Moist and fluffy, this cake is infused with the bright and citrusy flavors of fresh lemons. Each bite is a burst of tangy goodness, perfectly balanced with a touch of sweetness. Whether enjoyed on its own or paired with a cup of tea, our Lemon Cake is a delightful treat that will brighten your day.

reservations.name: example
reservations.description: we will be requesting only gluten free dishes
